content.description: Climbs low roof in tunnel between Chaos Boulder and large boulder next to it. Start matched in good pocket at south end of roof, make your way to a good right hand pocket, then a left hand undercling. Set your feet, then make a looong move to a jug. Bump your left to an undercling, then move to the face. Fantastic and fun moves, but the problem is kind of a lowball a$$-dragger.
content.location: In the tunnel on west side of boulder.

content.description: Just downhill from Split Boulder, Chaos has a nice south facing wall that is slightly overhung and nicely cobbled. The landing slopes down a bit, so spotters are a good idea. There is also a cool little roof at the intersection of this boulder and bigger one next to it.
